ps2.4:1.2: “Mettaya, bhikkhave, cetovimuttiya asevitaya bhavitaya bahulikataya yanikataya vatthukataya anutthitaya paricitaya susamaraddhaya ekadasanisamsa patikankha.
ps2.4:1.4: Sukham supati, sukham patibujjhati, na papakam supinam passati, manussanam piyo hoti, amanussanam piyo hoti, devata rakkhanti, nassa aggi va visam va sattham va kamati, tuvatam cittam samadhiyati, mukhavanno vippasidati, asammulho kalam karoti, uttari appativijjhanto brahmalokupago hoti.
